PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(93) ... niter 硝酸钾 nitid 明亮的 niton 氡.
仅指植物体表面无毛,这种表面有时具光泽(nitid),有时则比较暗淡(opacus),有时触感比较平滑(smooth),有时具有异色斑点状(maculate).

means.word_mean: 1. bright with a steady but subdued shining;

sentences.sentence: "from the plane we saw the city below agleam with lights"
